abstract: First-quarter earnings were reported a week after Comcast abandoned its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable
snippet: First-quarter earnings were reported a week after Comcast abandoned its planned takeover of Time Warner Cable
lead_paragraph: Time Warner Cable executives provided few clues on Thursday about whether the company would partake in a new round of deal activity, as it missed expectations for first-quarter profit but reported its strongest subscriber growth in years.

headline.main: Time Warner Cable Results Fall Short of Predictions
headline.print_headline: Results at Time Warner Cable Fall Short of Predictions
